front.title: ISO/IEC/IEEE International Standard -- Information technology -- Telecommunications and information exchange between systems -- Local and metropolitan area networks -- Specific requirements -- Part 11: Wireless LAN medium access control (MAC) and physical layer (PHY) specifications AMENDMENT 5

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Enhancements to the ISO/IEC/IEEE 8802.11(TM) physical layers (PHYs) and medium access control (MAC) sublayer to support operation in the white spaces in television bands are defined.
